answers.answer: Hi. I will be your buddy. I already have a toddler and am 7 wks with my husbands first child. =]

I also have other children ;) yay! This is cool well my name is Amy I'm 28 and this is my 4th preg my first I had a bilhated ovum.. which was a sac with no baby inside .. my second was my son Alex (5) and with my ex I was with for 8 years .. I am now married and have a son with him malaki (1) and preg with our second baby together so all together my husband has 2 boys (14)&(11) and my two is four BOYS .. so hoping this one will be our girl!

My sons name is mayson. His father and I split up when I was 7 months pregnant, but alex ( My husband is like a father to him). I too am hoping for a girl. My name is shannon, i live in tn. So far this pregnancy is different and i am finding it hard to raise a toddler work and deal with pregnancy. .. but i am surviving

I am a few days over 5 weeks due in March. This is my third pregnancy but I only have a 4 year old daughter named Paisley and angel baby triplets. My name is Angela and I'm nervous about this pregnancy so I would love to have someone to talk to thru my pregnancy:)
Yea OK! Do all of us want girls?
Wow my sons name is malaki mason lol ;)
Well.Shannon and Angela its nice meet u! Have either of u been to the doctor?
They said I was high risk again :(
I want a girl and this ia my 3rd pregnancy but my bfs first child.

I'm at 5wks 3days and wont have a scan until2 weeks from now. Yesterday, I started having brownish discharge which were 2 to 3 drops in my liner. But this morning, it increased specially when I wipe it after I pee... help please
Mine too ! I.hope we all get our girls !!!!
I hill you need to relax and put ur feet up.. I asked on ur other post.did u have sex sometimes that can cause u to bleed ?
Replied to that post., but to answer that, nope. Last was a week ago before I found out I'm preg
Hmm have you had any clots ot muscle type loss?
I am halfway through the forth week of my first pregnancy. I'd love to be your buddy!
Kitten OK .. I don't mind more then one buddy either ;)

I go to the doctor Thursday and I can't wait!!! I thought they would wait a little longer bc I will only be 6 weeks but I guess she's gonna keep a close eye on me since I had such a rough time my last pregnancy!

I am in the same boat Angela I'm am considered high risk again.. my numbers during my.last blood check before I was preg was on the high side for diabetes .. so they said chances are I will have goes diabetes again. ;( and my.BP is really high.. they put me on the.pregnancy safe blood pressure medicine
I will be calling tomorrow to the on and scheduling my first apt really nervous.
I will be 5 weeks tomorrow, have an 8 year old son, and although I don't have a gender preference, my husband and I are both thinking girl this time around.

question: Any one on here roughly 5 weeks along.. I have never done this but.I would love to have a pregnancy buddy to share info with and milestones freebies and just anything??? Well let me know!!
title: i want a preg buddy!
